discussion_comments.comment_body: Since we have a ton of structs here and they all work closely together, mind adding an abstract to the top of this file explaining the relationships and responsibilities of each of them? It'll go a _long_ way 😊

discussion_comments.comment_body:
A comment explaining how to use the MediaResource objects may be helpful here. Some immediate questions that would be helpful to answer here:
- the difference between `ok` vs `resolved` members
- the difference between `value` vs `resolvedValue` members
- how to use `MediaResource`
- what does all of this enable/prevent

Some of this information already exists, but it's scattered throughout the PR and PR body. Putting it here would be nice to have.
